animeTitle: Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King
otherNames: Quanmin Shenqi: Wo Xian Ji Yi Wan Sheng Ling Cheng Shen, Everyone Is a King: I Sacrifice Countless Lives to Become a King, I Ascend to Godhood With the Sacrifice of Billions of Lives, Quánmín Shénqí: Wǒ Xiàn Jì Yì Wàn Shēng Líng Chéng Shén, Spirit Sacrifi
synopsis: Han Wu transmigrated to a world where everyone can become a god. He obtained the ability to sacrifice life. At the beginning, he had a trash clan, so he sacrificed to change his fate against the heavens. With no power, no status, and no money, he sacrificed his way to the top. As long as he has enough followers, he can become infinitely stronger through sacrifice, becoming the main god, the god of gods!
